title: ICAI-RBI MoU Ushers in Real-Time UDIN Verification, Boosting Transparency & Regulatory Confidence
content:
# ICAI-RBI MoU Ushers in Real-Time UDIN Verification, Boosting Transparency & Regulatory Confidence

Ek important update hai for all Chartered Accountants! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Reserve Bank of India (RBI) ke saath ek Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) announce kiya hai, jo real-time Unique Document Identification Number (UDIN) verification ko enable karega.

*   **What's New:** This MoU facilitates real-time UDIN verification through a secure Application Programming Interface (API) integration, allowing seamless validation of CA-certified financial documents within RBI's systems.
*   **When it Happened:** The signing ceremony for this significant collaboration took place on February 6, 2026, at ICAI Bhawan, New Delhi. The press release detailing this development was issued on February 10, 2026.
*   **Why it Matters:** This initiative aims to significantly strengthen the transparency, authenticity, and regulatory confidence in financial documents certified by Chartered Accountants. It is expected to enhance due diligence, reduce manual intervention, strengthen data integrity, and mitigate risks associated with the misuse of certified documents. Ultimately, this will contribute to improved regulatory efficiency and ease of doing business for banks, NBFCs, and other regulated entities.
*   **Impact:** This collaboration marks a major step in enhancing regulatory oversight and reinforcing trust in the financial ecosystem through technology-driven verification mechanisms.
